data.title: The American Association of Immunologists
data.meta_description: Nobel Prize winning members of The American Association of Immunologists
data.text:
Nobel Laureates of AAI

First awarded in 1901, the Nobel Prize is recognized internationally as the most prestigious award conferred upon scientists for achievements in physiology or medicine, chemistry, and physics. AAI proudly presents the following biographical profiles to highlight the scientific accomplishments of the 27 remarkable AAI members who received this highest honor while also providing insight into their lives outside the laboratory.

Jules Bordet

AAI '60
